results.title: Mevalonate pathway inhibitors affect anticancer drug-induced cell death and DNA damage response of human sarcoma cells.
results.text_hl: We found that @CHEMICAL_Lovastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008148 @@@Lov@@@, @CHEMICAL_Diphosphonates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004164 @@@BP@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Met@@@ modulated the anticancer drug sensitivity of @<m>DISEASE_Sarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012509 @@@sarcoma@@@ cells in an agent-, dose and time-dependent fashion.

citations.NLM: Nilsson S, Huelsenbeck J, Fritz G. Mevalonate pathway inhibitors affect anticancer drug-induced cell death and DNA damage response of human sarcoma cells. Cancer Lett. 2011 May 1;304(1):60-9. PMID: 21356574

results.title: Effect of metformin on fibrosarcoma in hamsters.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as an anti-@DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ drug might be an effective and safe therapeutic approach in novel non-toxic therapies for @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Sarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012509 @@@sarcomas@@@.

citations.NLM: Popović DJ, Lalošević D, Miljković D, Popović KJ, Čapo I, Popović JK. Effect of metformin on fibrosarcoma in hamsters. Eur Rev Med Pharmacol Sci. 2017 Dec;21(23):5499-5505. PMID: 29243803

results.title: Bioenergetic properties of human sarcoma cells help define sensitivity to metabolic inhibitors.
results.text_hl: Using @CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2-deoxy-D-glucose@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Deoxyglucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003847 @@@2-DG@@@), a competitive inhibitor of glycolysis, @CHEMICAL_Oligomycins @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009840 @@@oligomycin@@@, an inhibitor of mitochondrial ATP synthase, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, a widely used anti-@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ drug and inhibitor of complex I of the mitochondrial respiratory chain, we evaluated the effects of metabolic inhibition on @<m>DISEASE_Sarcoma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012509 @@@sarcoma@@@ cell growth and bioenergetic function.

citations.NLM: Issaq SH, Teicher BA, Monks A. Bioenergetic properties of human sarcoma cells help define sensitivity to metabolic inhibitors. Cell Cycle. 2014;13(7):1152-61. PMID: 24553119
citations.BibTeX: @article{24553119, title={Bioenergetic properties of human sarcoma cells help define sensitivity to metabolic inhibitors.}, author={Issaq SH and Teicher BA and Monks A}, journal={Cell Cycle}, volume={13}, number={7}, pages={1152-61}}
